data:item.name: FRDM-STBA-A8964
data:item.display_title: Sensor shield board for FXLS8964AF ultra-low power motion wakeup sensor

overview.p: Sensor toolbox development board for FXLS8964AF with enablement software tools.

ul.li: Sensor Shield Board: FRDM-STBA-A8964 is a sensor add-on/companion shield board for FXLS8964AF 3-axis accelerometer
IoT Sensing SDK: Provides embedded sensor projects for the demo and custom kits through MCUXpresso
FreeMASTER-Sensor-Tool: Provides out-of-box sensor demo and application development platform for FXLS8964AF
